channel.title: Upcoming on Stanford RL Forum
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming on Stanford RL Forum

item.title: Epistemic Neural Networks
item.description: Logistics Time: 4:00-5:00 PM; Tuesday 5/31/2022 Hybrid Lecture Locations: Packard 101, Zoom Link Presenter Ian Osband Research Scientist, DeepMind, Mountain View Abstract Effective decision, exploration, and adaptation often require an agent to know what it knows and, also, what it does not know. This capability relies on the quality of joint predictions of labels assigned to multiple inputs. Conventional neural networks lack this capability and, since most research has focused on marginal predictions, this shortcoming has been largely overlooked.
